Text: I'm having a problem with loading the game as I am using coverfloader when i adjusted the settings for the game to work in takes me to the game selection screen as in wii sports or wii sports resort but when i select one my wii reboots. is there anyway i can extract the iso to seperate them into two seperate discs or should i just burn it. and if i burn it will i receive the 002 error code.
